fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Place a Burn on a player at night.
- Douse every player with at least one Burn on them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you live, whenever any ability affects any Underworld member, including abilities that are counted as astral or indirect, a Burn will be placed on the user.
- No victims know when a Burn is on them, but you will know the names of every player with a Burn on them at all times, as well as how many they have.
- Each burn will reduce the victim's defense by 1 level, to a minimum of Vulnerable.
- You can only use your Douse ability once, and only when at least 10 Burns exist on living players.
- Any time a player dies with at least one Burn on them, "burned to death" will replace whatever their true cause of death was.
